faq.question: Is netcat installed by default?
faq.answer: Netcat is not always pre-installed. Install with apt-get install netcat-traditional or ncat for enhanced features.

faq.question: What is the difference between nc and ncat?
faq.answer: ncat (from Nmap) offers SSL encryption, connection relaying, and HTTP proxy support. Use ncat when encryption is required.

faq.question: Does this skill execute any code?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides documentation and command references only. It does not contain or execute any scripts.

faq.question: Can I use these techniques on any network?
faq.answer: No. All techniques require explicit written authorization. Unauthorized network access is illegal.

faq.question: How do I detect netcat activity defensively?
faq.answer: Monitor for nc/ncat process execution, -e flag usage, unusual outbound connections, and named pipe creation.

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill reference?
faq.answer: MITRE ATT&CK techniques T1059, T1071, T1090, T1105 and PTES post-exploitation methodology.
